springboard-api-error-loadedelsewhere:
API error message thrown when the extension or skin is loaded in LocalSettings.php. Parameters:
* $1 - name of the extension / skin
springboard-api-error-alreadyinstalled:
API error message thrown when the extension or skin is already installed. Parameters:
* $1 - name of the extension / skin
springboard-api-error-notinstalled:
API error message thrown when the extension or skin is not installed. PParameters:
* $1 - name of the extension / skin
springboard-api-error-invalidtype: API error message thrown when the given type is invalid. Available types => [extension, skin]
springboard-api-error-composerfile:
API error message thrown when it could not find the composer.json file. Paramerters:
* $1 - name of the extension
springboard-extensions-tab-search-placeh: Placeholder text for the search box to filter extensions
springboard-skins-tab-search-placeholder: Placeholder text for the search box to filter skins
springboard-no-data: Message to show that there is no data available
